sourcesContent:
import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import { data } from '../datas/data' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faStar } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import Carousel from '../components/Carousel' import Collapse from '../components/Collapse' import '../assets/styles/logement.scss' import '../assets/styles/home.scss' function Title() { const { id } = useParams() const bien = data.find((item) => item.id === id) if (!bien) { window.location.href = '/Page404' } const host = bien.host const showTag = (tag) => { return tag.map((tag, index) => ( {tag} )) } const starRating = (rating) => { return Array.from({ length: 5 }, (_, index) => ( )) } return (

{bien.title}

{bien.location}
{host.name}
{showTag(bien.tags)}
{starRating(bien.rating)}

{bien.description}
    {bien.equipments.map((equipments, index) => (
  • {equipments}
    • ))}
) } export default Title
